variants.Description in input context: The K48A mutation had little effect on the stability of the parkin Ubld or ubiquitin indicating that this mutation contributes to defective protein-protein interactions.

The R42P mutation caused the complete unfolding of the parkin Ubld. This observation provides a rationale for the more rapid degradation of parkin carrying the R42P mutation in Vivo, and its inability to interact with some substrate proteins.
